channel.title: Guerra, Pia on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Guerra, Pia on Chege's Blog

item.title: Y: The Last Man
item.description: Plot Points [Christopher] I don’t get it. I mean, off the record, I understand fighting for equal pay and all that garbage… But I thought you feminists were pacifists, too. [Alter] Who wants peace, when we have not yet begun to fight? [Representative Brown] There are only thirteen females in the senate and sixty in the house… And almost three-fourths of us are democrats. A few wives of dead republicans think we’re trying to eliminate the two-party system just because we’re not giving them their husbands' seats.
